client.control

Class CreateAppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.control.CreateAppointmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CreateAppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    CreateAppointmentController connects between the CreateAppointmentUI to the components logics.
    Author:
    shays

      • onSearchSpecialistButtonClick

        public void onSearchSpecialistButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        onSearchSpecialistButtonClick function handles the search specialist button. The function gets the selected specialization from the Combobox. The function creates a FIND_SPECIALIST request and sends it to the server.
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • onMouseClick

        public void onMouseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        onMouseClick function handles a mouse click on a specialist name from the specialists table. The function gets the specialist ID from the table. The function creates a request of FIND_FULL_DATES to block unavailable dates in the date picker.
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • onMouseClickChooseHour

        public void onMouseClickChooseHour(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        onMouseClickChooseHour function handles a mouse click on a hour from the hours table. The function gets the hour from the table.
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • onCreateAppointmentButtonClick

        public void onCreateAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        onCreateAppointmentButtonClick function handles a click on create appointment button. function calls createAppointment with the GUI components parameters
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • createAppointment

        public void createAppointment(java.sql.Date date,
                              int hour,
                              int specialistID,
                              int clientID)
        The function creates a CREATE_APPOINTMENT request message and send it to the server.
        Parameters:
        date - Gets the appointment's date in sql.date format
        hour - Gets the appointment's hour 8:00, 18->16:30>
        specialistID - Gets the id of the specialist
        clientID - Gets the id of the client

      • onSelectDate

        public void onSelectDate(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        onSelectDate function handles a click on the date picker. The function creates a FIND_AVAILABLE_HOURS request and send it to the server.
        Parameters:
        event - the event
